name: 2019 7th International Conference on Bioinformatics and Computational Biology (ICBCB 2019)--Ei Compendex and Scopus
content: ICBCB 2019 Shining Points: 1\. Accepted papers can be published in International Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science), or published in International Journal of Bioscience, Biochemistry and Bioinformatics (IJBBB, ISSN: 2010-3638), and will be included in the Engineering & Technology Digital Library, and indexed by WorldCat, Google Scholar,Cross ref, ProQuest. 2\. Prof. Bijoy K. Ghosh from Texas Tech University, USA, Prof. Ming Chen from Zhejiang University, China, and Prof. Ralf Hofestadt from Bielefeld University, Germany have joined as Speakers. 3\. ICBCB 2019 will be held in Zhejiang University, China. 4\. Academic visit will be arranged on March 23, 2019\. == Paper Publishing: ICBCB 2019 papers can be published in International Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus,and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science), or published in International Journal of Bioscience, Biochemistry and Bioinformatics (IJBBB, ISSN: 2010-3638).
